title: The doctrines triall shewing both the necessity and the way of trying what is taught, in a sermon vpon 1 Thess.5.21. By Sam. Hieron.
author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
publisher: Printed by Humfrey Lownes, for William Butler [jun.]; and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet,
